channel.title: Writings on beach road fried toad
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on beach road fried toad

item.title: Northdown Beach Video
item.description: I installed the latest firmware udpate to my Sony a7iii (with much difficulty) to get the new intervalometer feature. Using it to try out a new video format idea I have had. Put simply, a series of timelapse sequences - all from the same scene. But the timelapses are short interval, around 1 second, longer than your average burst mode yet short enough to cover 10-20 seconds of action. Combining the nostalgic quality of photos and the immersing effect of video.

item.title: About this page
item.description: Beach Road Fried Toad. This is my corner of the internet. A place which isn’t social media to leave whatever I have been working on or doing, in a format which lends itself to archive more than attention. Video, photo, family, home, travels, food, music, projects â€“ anything really. Minimal text, minimal fluff. Some kind of diary, some kind of blog. by easy.
